entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow at times this morning and early this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
